metadata.title: CVE-2017-11353 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: yadm (yet another dotfile manager) 1.10.0 has a race condition (related to the behavior of git commands in setting permissions for new files and directories), which potentially allows access to SSH and PGP keys.

criterions.comment: yadm package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.12.0-1').
